message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a unique item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,000, but no more. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer it to you for $8,250. This is still a good value considering the benefits the product will bring to your business.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8,125. I hope we can find a compromise.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,125. I'm willing to make another slight adjustment and offer it to you for $8,200. This is still a good value considering the benefits the product will bring to your business.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $8,000. I'm willing to make one more offer: $7,900. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7,900. I'm willing to make one last adjustment and offer it to you for $8,100. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I understand that we've been negotiating for a while, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time and offer $7,950. This is my absolute final offer.
